## Parser class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Parser can parse claim data according to specification


 Parser

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Parser 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFieldSlotIndex(field, schemaBytes)](./polygonid-js-sdk.parser.getfieldslotindex.md) |  | **_(BETA)_** GetFieldSlotIndex return index of slot from 0 to 7 (each claim has by default 8 slots) for non-merklized claims |
|  [parseClaim(credential, credentialType, jsonSchemaBytes, opts)](./polygonid-js-sdk.parser.parseclaim.md) |  | **_(BETA)_** ParseClaim creates core.Claim object from W3CCredential |
|  [parseSlots(credential, schemaBytes)](./polygonid-js-sdk.parser.parseslots.md) |  | **_(BETA)_** ParseSlots converts payload to claim slots using provided schema |
